p.k: ‘A Place in the Sun' is a story about the inherently selfish humans fiercely fighting to take the throne of the Yangji Group, a conglomerate which
p.d: Starting from 1997 currency crisis, 2008 financial crisis… and 2019, we are living in the time where winning is the only option. KBS drama <A Place in the Sun> is a story about a man who was once hit the bottom returns to take what he was taken in the economic war…
